last_episode_to_air.name: The End of an Era
last_episode_to_air.overview: Trying to be better friends, Tonya and Elena step up to run events at Terra’s Little Person Retreat in Mexico. But after months of Cole harassing Autumn, an explosion erupts between them that leads to total chaos between the group. And once back in LA, Christy confesses deep, dark secrets about her marriage to Todd.

name: Little Women: LA
overview: The adventures of a unique group of smart, sexy and funny girlfriends with big hearts and big personalities – who all happen to be little people. Viewers walk in their shoes as they deal with relationships, parenting, careers and the ups and downs of friendships. They laugh, cry, compete and fight with one another, but despite it all they share a special unbreakable bond.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: The ladies of Little Women: LA are back, and more is at stake than ever before in Season 5. With new babies looming on the horizon for many of the ladies, all is well in love and friendship — until the new season forces everyone to come face-to-face with the hard truth about their relationships.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Tensions are higher than ever in season six. With the ladies focusing on their growing families and forging new career paths, making time for friendship has become increasingly difficult. When new opportunities arise for some, jealousy and old drama reemerges, affecting both friendship & marriage. Can the women come together and extinguish the fire before they all get burned again?

episodes.name: The M Word
episodes.overview: Meet the ladies of "Little Women: LA," they may be little but they like to live life large. Terra and Tonya enroll the ladies in a sexy dance class so they can all harness their inner goddess. While the ladies celebrate the end of Briana's marriage, Christy drops some very obvious hints about her desire to get married to her boyfriend Todd.

episodes.name: Little Women, Big Drama
episodes.overview: Christy goes shopping for her engagement ring even though Todd hasn't popped the question. While the women prepare for their "pinup girl" themed photo shoot, Traci reveals that she's set her wedding date, which aggravates Christy, and ignites a race to the altar. Terra and Elena temporarily mend their tense relationship when Elena reveals a heartbreaking story about growing up as a little person in Russia.

episodes.name: Who Do You Think You Are?
episodes.overview: Christy and Traci's bridal battle intensifies as Christy steals Traci's spotlight at her wine tasting party. Elena visits the doctor to find out what type of dwarfism she has and determine potential problems that might arise during pregnancy. When Traci has the women help her pick the perfect wedding gown, their tastes clash and things heat up.

episodes.name: The Ex-Factor
episodes.overview: Christy's race to get married is on track, but things start to move too quickly when she discovers she may be pregnant. Concerned with her daughter's well-being, Briana confronts her ex-husband about his new girlfriend. Tonya and Briana go speed dating to spice up their love lives. When Terra and Tonya get ready for a big performance, nothing can prepare them for what happens on stage.

episodes.name: Movin' on Up
episodes.overview: Terra has the ladies attend a cooking class and things get zesty as the conversation turns to Tonya's love life. In an effort to lose weight and prepare for their wedding, Christy and Todd diet and enroll in dance lessons. When Terra's boyfriend Joe fawns over Elena, Terra plans a sexy and intimate evening to remind Joe of their spark.

episodes.name: She's Booty-ful
episodes.overview: Booty's are the topics of conversation at a pool party when Elena considers breast implants and Terra asks the ladies to star in her "Booty Bee" music video. While Terra's recording her single, Christy tries to convince the women to back out of the video shoot.

episodes.name: Miss-Conception
episodes.overview: The ladies attend a wedding convention where the brides-to-be Traci and Christy throw down their bouquets and start a bridal battle. Elena discusses the possibility that she'll have a baby who's a little person and her husband's family is shocked. Terra breaks the news to Tonya that the man she's seeing might not be the good guy she thinks he is.

episodes.name: Sinner Takes All
episodes.overview: The little women visit "Sin City" and they're determined to give Las Vegas a run for its money while celebrating Traci and Christy's bachelorette parties. The women buy Traci a few drinks to see if they can loosen her up and are blown away by her hidden wild side. The men join the ladies in Vegas and in a spur of the moment decision Christy decides she wants to elope, but will Todd go along for the ride?

episodes.name: Here Comes the Bride
episodes.overview: Christy finalizes her last minute wedding details, from the dress and flower arrangements, to the venue, and quickly realizes her mother is a "momzilla." With wedding bells in the air, Terra and Joe feel pressure to discuss if they are really meant to be together. The ladies speculate why Elena isn't drinking...could there be a baby on the way?

episodes.name: Baby on Board
episodes.overview: The Little Women embark on a booze cruise, but it’s not all smooth sailing. Traci accuses Briana of lying about why she didn’t attend Traci’s wedding, but are Briana’s mysterious medical reasons true? Terra gets an offer that could change her career, but it would require a huge sacrifice she might not be willing to make. And the baby race is on between Elena, Christy and newly married Traci. But after a pregnancy test comes up positive, the question is, who’s pregnant?!?

episodes.name: Mama Drama
episodes.overview: Tonya learns Briana and Trevore have been talking behind her back and things get explosive at lunch with Trevore and his mom. Concerned with hearing her daughter is being bullied, Briana struggles with whether to tell her daughter she's a little person.

episodes.name: Baby Bump
episodes.overview: Christy and Briana start questioning Terra's motivations and friendships with the other women. Meanwhile, Traci struggles with her feelings of envy and Elena's burlesque performance exposes her trust issues with her husband.

episodes.name: A Little Fired Up
episodes.overview: The Triple T's aren't as tight as they used to be, as Traci and Tonya begin to question Terra's loyalty. And when Traci gets the news she's been dreaming of, she struggles with whether or not to tell her best friend Terra.

episodes.name: Stage Fight
episodes.overview: Briana confronts her family on why they aren't willing to meet her new boyfriend. Later, Briana braves the stage at an open mic night, but will she be able to keep the spotlight when Terra surprises everyone and takes the stage as well?

episodes.name: The Ex-Files
episodes.overview: Christy and Todd are faced with some unfortunate news, and decide to explore alternative options for having a child. Elena decides to have an uncommon cosmetic enhancement, but worries about how her husband Preston will react to her news. And Terra tries to hook up Tonya with a new man by throwing a "Used-Date Party," but when Christy brings Joe's ex-girlfriend to the event, things get physical.

episodes.name: Pain in the Butt
episodes.overview: After Tonya's "Used-Date Party" ends in a nasty brawl, the women try to pick up the shattered pieces of their friendship. Christy, Briana and Lila bring the girls together for a fun 5k race, only to insult Terra and Tonya, igniting another blow-up. Lila throws a cocktail party to make peace, but gets a frosty reception from everyone.

episodes.name: Into the Woods
episodes.overview: Terra treats the gang to a fun filled weekend on Catalina Island, but the news that they'll be roughing it on this vacation turns half the group into extremely unhappy campers. The ladies' sense of adventure is soon revitalized by a thrilling day of zip lining, and they reward themselves with a fancy dinner in town. But their meal ends with a bitter taste, as Lila, fed up with the girls, viciously lashes out at each of them.

episodes.name: Home Wreckers
episodes.overview: After trying to have a baby for months with no success, Christy and Todd explore IVF and find themselves torn after realizing they have some very big decisions to make. Briana invites the girls out to see her old friend Brad William's comedy show and Tonya isn't amused after he drops the "M" bomb during his routine. And after moving into a new house the week her mom comes to visit from Russia, Elena throws a housewarming party that is anything but warm when Traci and Christy start World War 3 within the group.

episodes.name: Little Women, Big Easy
episodes.overview: Following a nasty fight at Elena's house, Christy tries to make peace by bringing the entire group of girls, and their fighting husbands, to New Orleans. The group embraces the Big Easy lifestyle by dining on crawfish, petting alligators, and trying not to snap each others' heads off. But Briana's desire to visit a psychic infuriates Tonya, and everyone's tempers flare hotter than Cajun gumbo.

episodes.name: New Orleans, New Engagement?
episodes.overview: While vacationing in New Orleans, tension is at an all-time high as the group anticipates the arrival of Terra's boyfriend Joe, who hasn't seen the rest of the group since a fistfight broke out. Todd and Christy start arguing after he sides with his ex-girlfriend Briana instead of backing up his wife. And while Briana is blindly in love with her new Internet boyfriend, the other women are only seeing red flags, and Christy's ultimate attempt to derail their relationship may blow up in her face.

episodes.name: Friendtervention
episodes.overview: Newly engaged Briana is bombarded by her friends' concerns after Terra, Tonya and Traci take it upon themselves to do a background check on her new fiancé. Their shocking finds are too much for Briana to handle, and she struggles to decide whether or not her relationship is strong enough to withstand his past record. Elena's clothing line for both average size and little people starts to take shape, but as people start questioning her vision at the photo shoot, the pressure could prove to be more than she can handle. And as Terra's pregnant belly grows bigger each day...

episodes.name: Reunion Special Part 1
episodes.overview: The cast of "Little Women: LA" gets together to revisit the most exciting and dramatic moments from this season as well as provide a sneak peek of what the future holds.

episodes.name: Reunion Special Part 2
episodes.overview: The cast of "Little Women: LA" gets together to revisit the most exciting and dramatic moments from this season as well as provide a sneak peek of what the future holds.

episodes.name: LA Safari
episodes.overview: TThe Little Women set out for an adventure on an LA Wine Safari tour that quickly turns sour. Briana and Terra introduce new friends, Jasmine and Brittney, to the group, but little do they know that their paths have crossed with several of the girls before. Christy and Todd move forward with their plans for in vitro fertilization and Briana is ready to rekindle a relationship with Matt.

episodes.name: Big Secrets
episodes.overview: Jasmine is determined to win the girls over by hosting an extravagant party, but will her husband recently losing his job disrupt her plans? Meanwhile, Christy undergoes a painful IVF procedure and Terra reveals a shocking secret, one that may destroy a relationship forever.

episodes.name: Seattle or Bust
episodes.overview: After a fight with the girls, Briana takes Jasmine to Seattle to meet Matt. Christy and Todd struggle with intimacy as the IVF process puts pressure on their relationship. Brittney's dad, David, throws a "Leaving the Nest" BBQ for Brittney and tensions run high as Jasmine calls Tonya out about the problems from their past.

episodes.name: A Group Divided
episodes.overview: Christy and Todd's anniversary party turns sour when Christy's mother learns of their pregnancy plans. Elena discloses the dirty details of her relationship with David to Preston and Tonya throws a graduation party for her daughter.

episodes.name: Love and War
episodes.overview: Love is in the air, and all the women are upping the ante on their relationships. Brittney gets her flirt on with a new hottie who has boyfriend potential and Briana takes her relationship with Matt to the next level. Tonya lays her heart on the line, and talks to Jaa about the other "M" word: Marriage.

episodes.name: Working Girls
episodes.overview: Briana gets a life-changing opportunity to sign with a music agent but when she's put to the test with music producing legend, Kerry Gordy, her vocal talent comes into question. Meanwhile, Christy is recruited to do a comedy music video for which she must get Terra and the other girls to participate, a task which proves more challenging than she might have originally thought.

episodes.name: Friendships on the Rocks
episodes.overview: The girls gather at Jasmine's family's restaurant for Margarita Monday where Briana confronts Terra about how unkindly she treats her fiance , Matt. Terra is shocked and she and the girls decide that Briana's relationship with Matt is unhealthy.

episodes.name: No Pain, No Gain
episodes.overview: After a year of trying to make a baby, Christy and Todd undergo an artificial insemination procedure and receive their pregnancy test results! Elena starts planning a special event and Briana learns that she was the target of trash talk. Meanwhile, the ladies' bodies and tempers burn red hot on the set of Tonya's Little Boss Workout video and their bad attitudes threaten to shut the project down.

episodes.name: Bachelorette or Bust
episodes.overview: The women bust out the bikinis and booze to celebrate Elena's upcoming vow renewal with the bachelorette party she never had. As the girls play steamy bachelorette party games, Brittney surprises the girls when she breaks down over her ex-boyfriend. And Briana drops the mother of all secrets that could cause a major rift between the girls forever.

episodes.name: Truth and Lies
episodes.overview: After Briana's surprise announcement in Palm Springs, the women are hurt by the amount of lying Briana's been doing. Can they ever be the close friends they used to be? Meanwhile, vow renewal planning is in full swing, and Elena nervously waits for her family to arrive from Russia.

episodes.name: Hawaiian Couples Retreat
episodes.overview: After months of planning, friends and family travel to Elena and Preston's vow renewal in Hawaii! Although happy that her family could travel from Russia, Elena is in a race against the clock.

episodes.name: Big Vow Renewal
episodes.overview: While in Hawaii for Elena and Preston's vow renewal, trouble is brewing in paradise not only between the girls, but also with their significant others. Tonya is caught between taking her relationship with Jaa to the next level, or breaking up. Matt crosses the line with some of the women, and later Elena's desire for the dream wedding she never had quickly becomes a nightmare.

episodes.name: Reunion, Part One
episodes.overview: Host Tracey Edmonds sits down with the cast of Little Women: LA to recap the biggest moments from season three. The girls answer tough questions and things get serious when a surprise guest joins them on stage.

episodes.name: Reunion, Part Two
episodes.overview: Tracey Edmonds hosts the second half of the Little Women: LA reunion and it's filled with even more surprises. Briana's sister challenges her to reconnect with the family and the ladies find out the real scoop on Matt's online "fling."

episodes.name: Lost Footage
episodes.overview: The ladies of Little Women: LA introduce never-before-seen footage from the third season of the show. From extended scenes with family and friends to comedic outtakes, all is revealed.

episodes.name: MotoCrossed
episodes.overview: Jasmine hosts a Mommy Cocktail Party so the women can swap tips for raising children as Little People.

episodes.name: Beauty Brawl
episodes.overview: Elena has a preview party to test her new beauty products, but Jasmine becomes angry when she's left off the guest list. Elsewhere, an unexpected family member goes behind Briana's back and asks Terra and Christy to help bring her back to the family.

episodes.name: Sour Apples
episodes.overview: Briana's family reaches out in hopes of reconciling, but Matt insists their children will never meet her family. Elsewhere, Elena decides to tell Preston she wants to try for a baby; Jasmine may need to move out of the state so her husband can find a job; and Tonya gets vocal with Briana about Matt's mind games when the girls go apple picking.

episodes.name: Oh Baby!
episodes.overview: Tonya's daughter's father visits Los Angeles; Christy is concerned Todd being overweight may affect their chances of adopting a child; and Jasmine debates whether to try for a second baby. Meanwhile, Briana keeps a huge secret from Matt.

episodes.name: Couples Party Catastrophe
episodes.overview: Jasmine throws a couples party in hopes of pleasing Elena; Tonya feels like she's being left out because of her complicated relationship; and Briana and Christy try to mend their friendship. Later, Terra and Tonya get in a huge fight when Tonya puts a man before her friend.

episodes.name: Special Pizza Delivery
episodes.overview: Christy brings all the girls together for a fun day of pizza making following Terra's epic fight with Tonya and Elena; Elena receives some unexpected, life-changing news.

episodes.name: Hostile Housewarming
episodes.overview: Jasmine offers to throw a bachelorette party for Jasmine on the condition that she invite all the girls; Tonya and Terra find common ground; Elena learns that she is pregnant; an unexpected guest crashes Christy's housewarming party.

episodes.name: Cancun or Bust
episodes.overview: The women head to Mexico for Briana's belated bachelorette party; Elena struggles to hide news of her pregnancy; a jealous Christy breaks Briana's rules and orders a stripper.

episodes.name: The Party Continues
episodes.overview: As Briana's bachelorette party continues, Briana questions which ladies are there to support her marriage; Ali feels Terra's wrath; Christy is accused of being two-faced.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: The Mexico Bachelorette party wasn't the chance to reconnect with Briana that Terra had hoped for. Now that they're home in LA, Briana is ignoring all of Terra's attempts to reach out to apologize.

episodes.name: Media Frenzy
episodes.overview: When Terra confronts Christy about rumors she may be spreading, not just drinks but glasses are thrown, and Christy ends up in the hospital.

episodes.name: Ride or Die Wedding
episodes.overview: Fresh from the social media craze caused by the altercation between Christy and Terra, the women find themselves struggling to switch gears for Briana and Matt's upcoming nuptials.

episodes.name: Baby Showers and Blindsides
episodes.overview: Elena and Preston finally get to find out the gender of their twins, and decide to share the good news at their upcoming baby shower.

episodes.name: Reunion: Part 1
episodes.overview: Kevin Frazier hosts the Little Women: LA Season 4 reunion. From baby announcements, to police reports, to sexting scandals and everything in between, the women hash out all the dirty little details.

episodes.name: Reunion: Part 2
episodes.overview: As Kevin Frazier hosts the second half of the reunion show, at times he feels like he's in a wrestling ring, as the women of Little Women: LA get heated over some of the biggest scandals of Season 4.

episodes.name: Matt and Briana - Part 1
episodes.overview: After learning the extent of her husband Matt's infidelity, Briana tries to figure out the future for her family. After spending time apart, Briana and Matt see each other again at the Little Women: LA reunion.

episodes.name: Matt and Briana - Part 2
episodes.overview: Briana allows Matt to take her daughter to a school dance, creating friction with her ex-husband. After reconnecting with her birth mother and seeking the advice of a therapist, Briana makes a choice about the future or her marriage.

episodes.name: Spa Day Sparring
episodes.overview: In the fifth-season opener, Elena hosts a spa day for the ladies, but Briana doesn't show up, so her friends worry about her; and Christy and Terra remain at odds over the tea incident. Later, Joe reveals how he really feels about Christy.

episodes.name: Drama & Drag Queens
episodes.overview: Christy feels left out following a tense spa retreat; the ladies attend a drag-queen convention; and Terra receives big news at her OBGYN appointment. Later, the group wonders about Briana's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Lost & Found
episodes.overview: Briana deals with the emotional trauma of her near-death experience after spending eight days in the hospital. Later, Christy faces the consequences of betraying Briana; Tonya and Kerwin move in together; and Jasmine shares news related to her health.

episodes.name: Twins and Tears
episodes.overview: Jasmine hosts Briana's baby shower but has doubts about how many guests will show up in light of Briana's feud with the other ladies. Later, Christy considers reconciling with Briana; Tonya's past with Jaa resurfaces; and Elena's rushed to the hospital when her blood pressure skyrockets.

episodes.name: Deconstructive Criticism
episodes.overview: Elena's released from the hospital after giving birth, but her twins remain in the NICU. Later, Christy's daughter is rushed to the hospital; Terra worries about Tonya's logo for her new active-wear clothing line; and Kerwin gives Tonya an ultimatum, demanding that she cut business ties with her ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: Tough as Nails
episodes.overview: Tonya's plan to prove to Kerwin that she doesn't have feelings for her ex backfires. Later, Elena's twins are released from the hospital; and Tonya invites the ladies to build houses for charity, but drama between them threatens to derail the event.

episodes.name: Wild West Showdown
episodes.overview: Tonya plans a Western-themed party for Kerwin. Later, Terra learns she's not invited to the bash, leading her to arrange a secret meeting with Tonya's daughter; and Briana blames Christy when she ends up in legal trouble.

episodes.name: Pre-Pop Party
episodes.overview: Briana suspects Christy's involvement in her legal troubles and wonders about her sobriety. Later, Terra reveals secrets that Tonya's daughter told her; Jasmine voices her opinion about Matt's infidelity; and Matt and Briana head to the hospital after another health scare.

episodes.name: Murder She Wrote
episodes.overview: Briana recovers from her difficult pregnancy while her baby's monitored in the NICU. Later, Elena and Terra plan a murder-mystery party; the ladies wonder about Christy's involvement in Briana's legal troubles; and Terra takes a risk for an opportunity.

episodes.name: Plastic Problems
episodes.overview: Terra goes dancing with a friend from New York; and Jasmine confronts Christy about meddling with Briana's life. Later, Christy shows up at Tonya's photo shoot with an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Birthday Blowout
episodes.overview: Preston plans a surprise birthday party for Elena while her mother and sister are visiting from Russia, but the event ends up leaving the birthday gal in tears. Later, Terra and Joe have trouble buying their dream home; and Christy and Tonya argue about the drama at Tonya's photo shoot.

episodes.name: Belly Dance Battle
episodes.overview: Jasmine worries about an off-handed comment that Terra made; and Tonya suspects her daughter is hiding a secret about her dating life. Later, Terra organizes a belly-dancing class for the ladies, but an argument ensues after Jasmine confronts Terra about hurting her feelings.

episodes.name: Terra's Growing Family
episodes.overview: Christy reaches out to Jasmine after being separated from the ladies for weeks; and Tonya voices her concerns about Briana's ability to raise an average-size child. Later, Terra worries Joe won't return from his business trip in time for the birth of their second child.

episodes.name: Name Game
episodes.overview: Briana goes to extreme lengths to protect her family after receiving threats; Terra and Joe struggle to agree on their newborn son's name; and Elena and Briana host a party to show off their babies. Later, Tonya and Briana agree to forgive Christy if she makes a sincere apology, but Christy refuses to meet their terms.

episodes.name: High Stakes Friendship
episodes.overview: Terra and Joe continue to argue about their son's name; and Christy invites the ladies to a casino night, but they're not pleased after she releases her medical records. Later, the gals are shocked to see Christy also invited Dawn and other outsiders.

episodes.name: Playing with Fire
episodes.overview: Christy apologizes to Terra and Briana following her disastrous casino night. Later, Terra worries about meeting her partner for "Dancing With the Stars" for the first time; and Tonya invites the ladies to attend a survivalist retreat.

episodes.name: Sail Away
episodes.overview: The ladies find themselves at an emotional impasse following Tonya's survivalist retreat. Later, Elena invites the group to go land sailing in the desert, but Terra and Briana have trouble keeping an open mind about Christy.

episodes.name: Season 5 Reunion, Part 1
episodes.overview: Part 1 of 2. Kevin Frazier reunites the cast to discuss Season 5. Later, Matt is confronted about his disloyal behavior; Christy tries to make amends with Terra and Briana; and a sneak peek of "Little Women: Dallas" is shared.

episodes.name: Season 5 Reunion, Part 2
episodes.overview: Conclusion. The men join the ladies to discuss their families' new additions. Later, Bri considers forgiving Tonya; Christy invites friends to help defend herself; and a sneak peek of "Little Women: Dallas" is shared.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: The ladies of Little Women: LA are back, and more is at stake than ever before in Season 5. With new babies looming on the horizon for many of the ladies, all is well in love and friendship — until the new season forces everyone to come face-to-face with the hard truth about their relationships.

episodes.name: Ballroom Blitz
episodes.overview: The girls feel that Terra has changed since she began competing on “Dancing with the Stars,” and fears she is sacrificing her family, friendships, and her little body for the wrong reasons. Terra is blindsided when Elena demands she quit the competition. Meanwhile, Tonya receives a concerning diagnosis.

episodes.name: Tough Crowd
episodes.overview: Terra has made it to the semi-finals of Dancing with the Stars, but with two hernias, a bevy of other health issues, and waning support from friends, the pressure seems to be closing in from all directions. Meanwhile, Christy is preparing for a cutting edge surgery that has never been performed on a little person. And Elena, Tonya, and Briana go to a comedy show that ends in tears.

episodes.name: Things Fall Apart
episodes.overview: Briana worries she might be suffering from Postpartum Depression. After life threatening complications during her ground breaking surgery, Christy’s recovery is even harder than anticipated, and she’s frustrated with Todd’s lack of help. Meanwhile, Terra finds herself wishing she were back in the ballroom, and struggles to fulfill her promises of making her family, friends and health a priority.

episodes.name: On Thin Ice
episodes.overview: After months of dealing with a tough pregnancy, Jasmine’s delivery isn’t as easy as she would have hoped for. Briana is rushed to the hospital with severe pain, and worries she could need surgery. And tension is at an all-time high between Elena and Terra, whom have not spoken to each other in over a month. Will ice skating be the perfect place for Elena and Terra have some fun and make up? Or is their friendship on thin ice with no hopes of coming back?

episodes.name: The Girl Who Cried Divorce
episodes.overview: With limited help from husband Todd, and a lack of concern from her friends, Christy’s recovery from neck surgery is lonelier than she ever expected. Meanwhile, Terra finds out Briana went behind her back to try to advance her own career, and after another major fight, Briana tells Matt she wants a divorce. With the girls doubting whether or not Briana will follow through with her threats, will she cave or stand her ground?

episodes.name: Vision Quest
episodes.overview: Terra throws a vision board party and confronts Briana about rumors that she tried to steal Terra’s manager. After Briana stumbles through a denial, more people come forward with evidence suggesting the conversation wasn’t as innocent as Briana claims. Who will Terra believe? Jasmine and Elena are approached by Briana’s friend Lisa, who reveals jaw dropping information about Briana’s husband Matt. Meanwhile Tonya and Kerwin argue over the expectations they have for each other in order to take the next step and get married.

episodes.name: Big Little Lies
episodes.overview: Elena and Preston have spent months wondering if one or both of their twin boys has dwarfism.  Now the genetics results are in, and Elena struggles with what that means for their family. Meanwhile, Briana’s friend Lisa finally reveals to Briana that Matt’s behavior is making her feel uncomfortable.  But Matt’s version of events is very different, and he spins the blame back on Lisa.  Jasmine and Elena unwillingly end up in the middle of Briana’s mess, which could have long-term consequences for their friendship.  And when the girls and their guys go to Monster Jam, it’s not all fun and trucks, when Terra tries to get the truth behind some of Briana’s lies.

episodes.name: March Madness
episodes.overview: Terra and Tonya rally at the LA Women’s March, but Briana bails because she thinks Terra is going for the wrong reasons.  Meanwhile, Christy and Todd seek medical weight-loss advice.  Elena gets heartbreaking news and immediately heads to Russia to be with her family. And when Terra’s fashion designer friend Mary visits from London, Tonya lashes out over the legitimacy of Mary’s couture line. Is Mary the international model and designer she claims she is?

episodes.name: Bringing Sexy Back
episodes.overview: Briana and Terra’s feud continues to heat up when Terra belittles Briana in front of the girls.  Meanwhile, Elena voices her criticism of Mary’s couture clothing designs, and Mary throws Elena’s own failed fashion line in her face. Briana tries to advance her modeling career by setting up a sexy boudoir photo shoot. And when Terra invites the girls to the Sexual Health Expo, it’s not all fun and games, when Briana accuses Jasmine of joining Terra’s clique rather than acting as a true friend to her.

episodes.name: Model Behavior
episodes.overview: When Mary holds runway auditions for her London fashion show, Elena puts her on blast for not being authentic. As their argument escalates, Terra regrets inviting both ladies to an upcoming art show, for fear that their fight will reach a boiling point. Meanwhile, Briana gets the first glimpse at the photos from her racy photo shoot and Christy and Todd receive shocking results from his pre-op tests. When Briana arranges a lunch to ease tension with Jasmine, it back fires as Jasmine is ready to end their friendship altogether.

episodes.name: Shady Business
episodes.overview: Terra is thrilled her dream of writing a book is becoming real and meets with her editor for the first time. But when she breaks her big news to the girls, not everyone is happy for her. Elena thinks Terra doesn’t make her family her first priority and questions making Terra the Godmother to her twin boys. Meanwhile, Briana is not only accused of shady business practices by Christy, but she’s also shocked to find out her son Maverick may need an invasive surgery.

episodes.name: Baptism Blowout
episodes.overview: Terra receives terrifying results from her mammogram, and is faced with the possibility of having breast cancer. Christy is overwhelmed by her nagging mom and bratty teenage daughter. And when Elena has a party for her newly baptized twins, Terra blows up when she finds out that Jasmine has been named the twin’s Godmother instead of her.

episodes.name: Fractured Friendships
episodes.overview: When Terra meets with Elena to apologize for exploding at the twin’s baptism party, Elena refuses to listen and takes the conversation to a whole new level. Later, Terra receives her biopsy results, and discovers whether or not she has breast cancer. Meanwhile, Tonya finally has a fashion show for her Little Boss Body Activewear. But when Jasmine and Briana are shocked to learn they were left off the fashion show guest list, they arrive at Tonya’s celebration party with one word on their mind–revenge.

episodes.name: Big Trouble, Little Video
episodes.overview: On the heels of her successful fashion show, Tonya’s stress levels are through the roof. Not only has her beloved dog been stolen, but she still faces major issues with her apparel manufacturer. Meanwhile, Christy is a nervous wreck when her husband Todd finally has weight-loss surgery.  And Terra throws her daughter Penny an over the top Birthday Party. But the celebration isn’t all fun and games, when Terra shows the rest of the girls a scandalous video from Christy’s past.

episodes.name: Fierce Fight
episodes.overview: Christy is shocked to hear that Terra has been showing off a scandalous video from her past.  Meanwhile, Briana reaches out to Terra for career advice, but is blindsided to find out that people are talking about a very sensitive topic behind her back. And with Terra’s book launch a week away, Jasmine has major issues with the title, which snowballs into huge fights with both Terra and Elena.

episodes.name: Warrior Dash
episodes.overview: Since the birth of her son, Jasmine fears that her and Chris have become less like husband and wife and more like roommates. Terra is down to the wire to obtain releases before her book launch and makes a last-ditch effort to get Christy and Briana to sign. And when the girls participate in a Warrior Dash, Briana approaches Tonya about rumors that Tonya has been spreading about her, ultimately causing all the girls to air their dirty laundry.

episodes.name: Alaska Adventure
episodes.overview: Briana is shocked to find out about Terra’s latest sneaky business move, which could have a major impact on Briana’s career. Jasmine’s husband Chris finally gets his long awaited notice of a job opening, but it puts Jasmine in a sticky situation as she nears the end of her maternity leave. And Terra arranges a couple’s vacation trip to Alaska, hoping to give the group a chance to reconnect as friends. But when Tonya goes against Terra’s wishes and invites Christy, Terra retaliates by blasting her on social media the night before the trip. Upon arriving in Alaska, the girls defend Christy, sending Terra into a total meltdown.

episodes.name: Interventions and Infidelity
episodes.overview: After Terra’s meltdown on the mountain, Jasmine and Elena feel that she is out of control and decide it’s time for a friendship intervention. Terra and Joe try to play matchmaker with Tonya and Kerwin, to help get them down the aisle faster. Meanwhile, Briana and Matt try to reconnect after a huge fight leaves Matt missing for several hours. But when Terra breaks the news that Matt was spotted around the hotel with another woman, Briana’s worst fears are confirmed.

episodes.name: Crazy In Love
episodes.overview: After hearing Matt’s shocking confession, Briana is yet again, at a crossroad in her marriage. Meanwhile, Tonya and Kerwin shop for engagement rings, but Tonya’s dreams of a three-carat diamond may be too much pressure for Kerwin to handle. And when Elena invites the girls out to dinner, Terra brings the night out to a screeching halt when she starts fighting with Christy and Elena and the girls decide to leave.

episodes.name: '80s Prom
episodes.overview: In the wake of the fight between Terra and Elena, both girls are left questioning their friendship. Can they be besties again, or frienemies forever? Briana and Matt seek marriage counseling, but after everything Matt has put her through, will Briana be able to trust him again? And when Jasmine hosts a totally ’80s Prom, Tonya is forced to make the biggest decision of her life.

episodes.name: Season 6 Reunion, Part 1
episodes.overview: Host Kevin Frazier brings the ladies of Little Women: LA together to discuss the craziness of Season 6. When Kevin interrogates Terra on her hypocritical actions with Christy, Joe interjects from the sidelines to defend his wife. Later, Briana’s former friend Lisa sets the record straight about the inappropriate texts Briana’s husband Matt sent her. And when Matt joins the stage, all hell breaks loose when the women demand explanations for Matt cheating on Briana in Alaska.

episodes.name: Season 6 Reunion, Part 2
episodes.overview: The reunion continues when Stephania joins the group to reveal all the juicy details of her scandalous night in Alaska with Briana’s husband Matt. Later, Mary breaks down while defending her fights with Tonya and Elena. Kerwin and Angelique join the cast and confirm ongoing issues with Tonya and Kerwin’s engagement. And we get a sneak peek at “Little Women: LA: Couples” Retreat.

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: After getting engaged to Kerwin, Tonya organizes a couples’ retreat in Puerto Rico, but she gets more than she bargained for when surprise guests crash the trip. Meanwhile, Christy makes a shocking discovery about a friend and a confrontation turns physical.

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Express Yourself
episodes.overview: Christy and Todd open up and share things they’ve never told each other before. The Tiny Twins make twerking a relationship building exercise. And just a few days into the couple’s retreat, will one couple decide that it’s more than their relationship can handle?

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Breakfast Beef
episodes.overview: A private argument at breakfast quickly turns public and heated. Later, Todd is eager to have new life experiences with Christy, while Jazmin and David's relationship hits a stumbling block when David reveals an intimate secret.

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Don’t Poke the Bear
episodes.overview: Chris calls out Matt for crossing the line; Tonya and Kerwin admit that they may have problems they’ll never be able to work through; and Hasani’s activity for the day pushes the group over the edge.

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Busting Up
episodes.overview: After a partner swap, Matt tries to make amends with the group and Christy realizes that her mothering ways may have killed the passion in her marriage. Meanwhile, Amanda confronts Andrea about moving back to Atlanta and wonders if the Tiny Twins are over for good?

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Twin Explosions
episodes.overview: The couples are challenged to let go of the past, but Andrea can't, and things get heated when she finally confronts Chris. Briana and Christy begin to repair their friendship while Tonya questions if Kerwin is "the one"?

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Flight or Fight
episodes.overview: Emotions run high as Jazmin pushes David past his comfort zone and a repetitive fight makes Tonya and Kerwin rethink their future together. Meanwhile two of the men scheme a plan that, after several years of marriage, may shock their wives.

episodes.name: Couples Retreat: Girls on Top
episodes.overview: As the retreat draws to a close, two couples plan to renew their wedding vows, but Jazmin and David hit a snag when it comes to planning the ceremony. Meanwhile, Andrea and Chris make a life-changing decision.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Tensions are higher than ever in season six. With the ladies focusing on their growing families and forging new career paths, making time for friendship has become increasingly difficult. When new opportunities arise for some, jealousy and old drama reemerges, affecting both friendship & marriage. Can the women come together and extinguish the fire before they all get burned again?

episodes.name: Lucky 7
episodes.overview: Lucky 7 symbolizes a big shift in the lives of all of the Los Angeles Little Women; the ladies of Los Angeles conquer their fears and push the boundaries of friendship

episodes.name: The Boss Is Back
episodes.overview: To help Tonya get her groove back, Terra rents a party bus and invites all the girls out; Terra's friend Mika confronts Elena about her attitude; Elena worries Preston will not be onboard with her next business venture.

episodes.name: The Blame Game
episodes.overview: Christy and Todd are caught off guard when Autumn decides she wants to move out; Elena searches for a location for her beauty bar, but the reality of how much it will cost begins to dash her dreams; Terra sets out to make peace with Elena.

episodes.name: Sour Grapes
episodes.overview: After getting off to a rough start with the girls, Mika proposes a weekend getaway to wine country; Tonya wonders if breaking up with Kerwin is the right decision; Terra embarks on her latest business venture that is not free of controversy.

episodes.name: Injections And Rejections
episodes.overview: On a quest to regain her self-confidence, Christy throws a botox party. Elena shadows a beauty salon owner, and discovers she may be in over her head. Meanwhile, Tonya is livid that Terra is launching a wine with a controversial name. But Terra's attempt to smooth things over leaves an even bigger rift between the two best friends.

episodes.name: Backstabbing Beauties
episodes.overview: Terra holds a focus group for her controversial wine label; Tonya questions her recent breakup, and shocks the group when she arrives to a party with her ex; Jasmine feels betrayed when Elena makes Terra a lucrative business offer.

episodes.name: Sober Celebration
episodes.overview: Christy celebrates eight years of sobriety, but not everyone is in a festive mood when they find out the guest list includes troublemaker Lila; and failed business partnerships continue to wreak havoc on the group.

episodes.name: Sundae Funday
episodes.overview: Terra and Joe finally get their son’s genetic test results; Jasmine starts voice lessons; and when Terra throws an old-fashioned sleepover complete with onesies and a sundae bar, one of the ladies is shocked to learn she’s not invited.

episodes.name: Lil Panty Droppers
episodes.overview: Christy and Autumn get a reality check when they do a trial run as realtors. Elena struggles with whether or not to apologize to Jasmine over business matters. Meanwhile, Mika visits LA with her husband and daughters. But when Mika gathers the girls for a BBQ and Undie Walk for charity, Tonya wants nothing to do with her.

episodes.name: Get Happy
episodes.overview: Terra mentors Mika on starting her own YouTube channel; Christy becomes overprotective when her daughter Autumn wants to go clubbing for the first time; and Mika tries to apologize to Tonya, but Tonya has other things in mind.

episodes.name: Stage Fright and Heartache
episodes.overview: Jasmine stage fright threatens to ruin her father’s performance before it’s begun; Terra struggles with Tonya, demanding she chooses between business and friendship; and a confession from Christy brings to the surface all her old issues with Todd.

episodes.name: Extreme Therapy
episodes.overview: Sick and tired of all the broken relationships, Christy and Tonya call their relationship guide, Hasani. In an intense couples therapy, Todd reveals the truth about why he does not agree with Christy's decision to have weight-loss surgery. Motivated to work on their friendships and conquer their fears, things heat up when the girls are put through an extreme challenge in Hasani's teambuilding bootcamp.

episodes.name: Sideways in Solvang
episodes.overview: After Mika’s prank on Tonya goes horribly wrong, Terra is on damage control for her part in the incident. Meanwhile, Mika utters controversial comments on Christy’s weight, leading to a nasty food fight. Once the group returns home from Solvang, Tonya professes her love to Jaa even though he has a girlfriend.

episodes.name: Kicking and Screaming
episodes.overview: After weeks of preparing for weight-loss surgery, Christy finally goes under the knife; Terra breaks down after hearing her daughter may need surgery to reduce the pressure on her brain; some of the girls feel the kickball team's name is offensive.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Booze
episodes.overview: Elena takes a step towards opening her beauty salon; Tonya gets news that could cancel her party with just days until her wine launch; and after months of fighting, Christy’s frustrations with Todd lead her to take drastic measures.

episodes.name: Sins and the City
episodes.overview: Tonya plans a girls trip to Las Vegas on a mission to change her daughter’s mind about moving away from home; Christy escapes to visit her mom, and confesses shocking details about her marriage with Todd; and after new details immerge, Tonya and Christy are convinced that Terra is lying about being no longer involved with Black Girl Moscato.

episodes.name: Ghost, Guns, Girls Trip
episodes.overview: With tension growing between Jasmine and Mika, Terra arranges a girls trip to Placerville, California, so everyone can experience Mika on her own turf. But when five little women roll into this California Gold Rush town, from ghost hunts to gun ranges, everyone is out of their element. And when Tonya is pushed to her emotional limit, she shocks the women with details of her father’s death. Later, Elena’s bad attitude infuriates Terra and Christy, until they explode.

episodes.name: Hoarders and Performers
episodes.overview: Jasmine pursues her love of music by signing up for a performance showcase, but struggles to overcome her anxiety and stage fright. Christy and Todd try to de-clutter their lives, and their marriage. And when Elena isn't completely truthful with the girls, unresolved issues strike a chord between her and Terra.

episodes.name: Little Issues
episodes.overview: Terra joins forces with the Dwarf Athletic Association to sponsor a bocce tournament; Christy pushes forward with her body transformation but struggles when Todd does not match her momentum; Elena admits some of her insecurities.

episodes.name: Marriage on the Rocks
episodes.overview: Christy decides to start a lingerie line, but not everyone is supportive of her new business venture; Terra and Jasmine worry about their friendship with Elena as she becomes more distant; Jasmine makes a drastic move to re-spark her marriage.

episodes.name: Chili Dog Dreams
episodes.overview: Jasmine's Bridezilla tendencies are revealed; when creative differences between Christy and her lingerie designer arise, Christy is forced to face her fears and deal with her own body image; Tonya helps relaunch her family's chili dog business.

episodes.name: Hen Party Fiasco
episodes.overview: Elena presents her children's book to the girls; Mika brings some male entertainment to Jasmine's hen party that threatens to shut the whole thing down; Christy books an acting gig that conflicts with Jasmine's special day.

episodes.name: I Do's and Don'ts
episodes.overview: Jasmine and Chris celebrate with an elaborate marriage vow renewal ceremony, but everyone stresses about whether or not Christy will show up for the big day; Christy must choose between a dream job and a friendship.

episodes.name: Social Media Intervention
episodes.overview: Christy tries to help Todd qualify for a surgery that will drastically help his mobility, but instead of following the doctor’s orders, Todd drags his feet. Meanwhile, Terra gathers the girls for a very unique intervention for Tonya — a Social Media Intervention. But everyone is shocked when accusations surface about things Jaa is saying behind Tonya’s back.

episodes.name: Meddling Queen
episodes.overview: After losing a ton of weight, Christy seeks out treatment for her recent hair loss. Elena finally confesses to the girls the root of her attitude issues. Meanwhile, Terra co-hosts Drag Queen Bingo as a fundraiser for Hydrocephalus. But when Jasmine concocts a plan to resolve Tonya and Christy’s ongoing fight at the event, everything blows up in her face.

episodes.name: The Snowball Effect
episodes.overview: Christy sees the first of her lingerie designs brought to life, but not every piece is a success. Cracks form in Autumn and Cole’s friendship when Cole feels like his advice goes in one ear and out the other. And a ski trip takes an explosive turn when Terra accuses Christy of lying.

episodes.name: Russian Roulette
episodes.overview: Terra and Joe are on pins and needles when their daughter Penny has to have multiple medical tests. Christy lays down the law with her daughter Autumn after finding out she’s complaining about her mom behind her back. Meanwhile, Elena gathers the women to her house for a traditional Russian dinner, and to reveal her latest business venture. But still hot after their last fight, Terra and Christy lash out at each other, revealing secrets that can never be unheard.

episodes.name: Truth and Dare
episodes.overview: On the heels of one of their dirtiest fights ever, Jasmine, Elena and Tonya do damage control between Terra and Christy. But Christy puts drama aside to further her aspiring lingerie line. Meanwhile, Terra makes huge strides planning her Little Person retreat, and comes up with a unique way to reveal it to the group. But with things still so rocky with Christy, Terra reveals more secrets from their past.

episodes.name: Totally Shady
episodes.overview: Elena takes huge professional strides by producing a photo shoot for her eye new shadow palette, and having the first public reading of her children’s book. But with the bad blood between Terra and Christy, Elena fears that putting them in the same room for her events might be career suicide. Meanwhile, Christy fights with Todd over his lack of motivation to become healthier. And Terra breaks down over devastating news about her daughter’s health

episodes.name: Baring It All
episodes.overview: Tonya gives the women the true strip club experience at the premiere of her play “Roxy.” Terra finalizes plans for her LP retreat that is just days away, even though she might not be able to attend due to her daughter’s health condition. Meanwhile, Christy’s stress level is through the roof with the launch of her lingerie line. But when Todd shows up to her fashion show looking like a slob, Christy reaches her breaking point

episodes.name: Big Little Retreat
episodes.overview: With her marriage to Todd on the rocks, Christy seeks advice from Tonya. Meanwhile, Terra hosts her “Pushing Boundaries” retreat in Mexico. But between worrying about her daughter Penny’s health, her nemesis Lila showing up from New York, and Cole instigating fights with Autumn, Terra’s retreat may be over before it’s even started.

episodes.name: The End of an Era
episodes.overview: Trying to be better friends, Tonya and Elena step up to run events at Terra’s Little Person Retreat in Mexico. But after months of Cole harassing Autumn, an explosion erupts between them that leads to total chaos between the group. And once back in LA, Christy confesses deep, dark secrets about her marriage to Todd.
